parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance to which the traffic policies belong.

parameters.name: Address
parameters.description: The IP address of the traffic destination.

parameters.name: EndpointGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the endpoint group to which the traffic policies belong.

parameters.name: EndpointId
parameters.description: The ID of the endpoint to which the traffic policies belong.

parameters.name: ListenerId
parameters.description: The ID of the listener to which the traffic policies belong.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **1 to 50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the Global Accelerator (GA) instance. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.
